    • Method Detail

      • checkUnreadPosts

        public static void checkUnreadPosts(Forum forum,
                    Map tracking,
                    long lastVisit)
        Check if some forum has unread messages.
        Parameters:
        forum - The forum to search for unread messages
        tracking - Tracking of the topics read by the user
        lastVisit - The last visit time of the current user

      • getAllCategoriesAndForums

        public static List getAllCategoriesAndForums(UserSession us,
                             int anonymousUserId,
                             Map tracking,
                             boolean checkUnreadPosts)
        Gets all forums available to the user.
        Parameters:
        us - An UserSession instance with user information
        anonymousUserId - The id which represents the anonymous user
        tracking - Map instance with information about the topics read by the user
        checkUnreadPosts - true if is to search for unread topics inside the forums, or false if this action is not needed.
        Returns:
        A List instance where each record is an instance of a Category object

      • notifyUsers

        public static void notifyUsers(Forum f,
               Topic t,
               Post post)
        Sends a "new topic" notification message to all users watching the forum.
        Parameters:
        f - The Forum changed
        t - The new topic
        post - the newly created message
